message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair.
Considering the inflation, I think I deserve a bit more. How about 60-40?
I'm willing to give you a little more, but I still think a 55-45 split is fair considering the inflation affecting you more.
Inflation is taking its toll on me. I think a 65-35 split is fair given the circumstances. Hope you see it my way!
Okay, I'm willing to budge a bit more. How about a 60-40 split? We can't keep going back and forth forever.
